home.heroSlogan: Quality first, reputation first. Providing reliable and efficient logistics services.

companyIntro.title: Company Introduction
companyIntro.description: We specialize in import/export transportation, customs clearance, and international express shipping. Based in Beijing with a professional team, we provide quality logistics services. We have established partnerships with global logistics companies, a complete network, and overseas warehouses to serve customers worldwide.

internationalExpress.title: International Express Shipping
internationalExpress.description: Global express network providing fast, safe, and reliable international shipping for documents, samples, and small batches.

customsClearance.title: Import and Export Customs Clearance
customsClearance.description: Professional customs clearance team familiar with international regulations. We handle declaration, inspection, approval, and tax settlement for smooth import/export.

transportation.title: Import and Export Transportation
transportation.description: Global transportation services with partnerships across airlines and shipping companies. We offer air, sea, land, and rail options for safe and timely delivery.

footer.copyright: Copyright © 2024 Beijing Anjet-Sender International Logistics Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

mainBusiness.title: Three Main Businesses: Import and Export Transportation, Import and Export Customs Clearance, International Express Shipping
mainBusiness.titleEn: Import and Export Transportation、Import and Export Customs Clearance、International Express Shipping

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We deliver end-to-end import and export transportation solutions via air, sea, and road. We tailor these options to create a flexible logistics chain that guarantees the secure, rapid, and punctual delivery of your cargo. Our expert team ensures seamless customs clearance by proactively managing all documentation and tax regulations, navigating the complexities on your behalf for a hassle-free experience. With a global express delivery network, we connect you to countless countries and territories. Rely on us for speed and reliability to fulfill all your international shipping needs.

company.title: Company Introduction
company.description: Our company brings years of logistics experience and a professional management team to the table. We are consistently committed to our core principles of "Quality First, Reputation Supreme," providing clients with superior, reliable, and highly efficient logistics services. We are continuously optimizing our service procedures, strengthening internal management, and enhancing transportation efficiency to meet the diverse needs of our clients.
